[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [StateKey Injection] Can malicious HumanReadable<StateKey> strings in the JSON inject arbitrary state keys (e.g., system addresses, validator configs) that override critical blockchain state? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [StateKey Parsing] Does HumanReadable deserialization properly validate StateKey format, or can parsing errors lead to incorrect state key interpretation and wrong state modifications? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [StateKey Collision Attack] Can an attacker craft multiple HumanReadable strings that deserialize to the same StateKey, causing hash collisions in the HashMap and state corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [StateKey Serialization] Does HumanReadable::to_string on line 20 handle all StateKey variants correctly, or can certain StateKeys serialize to ambiguous strings that deserialize incorrectly? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [HashMap Capacity] Can an attacker provide a delta HashMap with capacity exceeding system limits, causing allocation failures or integer overflow when creating BTreeMap on line 17? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [HashMap DoS] Can the deserialized HashMap on line 37 contain millions of entries that exhaust memory when inserted into the result HashMap on line 39? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Hash Collision DoS] Can an attacker craft StateKeys that hash to the same bucket in HashMap, causing O(n) lookup performance and DoS during simulation? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [None Value Semantics] Does the Option<StateValue> on line 21 correctly represent state deletions (None values), or can confusion between deletion and missing keys cause state inconsistencies? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [None Value Attack] Can an attacker inject None values in the JSON to delete critical state entries (e.g., account resources, module code) during simulation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [State Completeness] Does save_delta verify that all modified state is captured in the delta, or can missing entries cause incomplete state restoration? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [State Validation] Does load_delta validate that loaded StateValues are compatible with current protocol version, or can old incompatible state cause VM errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Concurrent Write] If multiple threads call save_delta with the same delta_path, can concurrent writes corrupt the file or cause partial writes? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Concurrent Read] If load_delta is called while save_delta is writing the same file, can it read partially written data causing deserialization errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Iterator Safety] Is iteration over the delta HashMap on line 19 safe if the HashMap is modified concurrently, or can it cause undefined behavior? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Error Propagation] Does save_delta properly handle all error cases (BCS serialization failure, hex encoding failure, JSON serialization failure, file write failure), or can silent failures lead to data loss? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Error Handling] Are all error cases in load_delta (file read, JSON parse, hex decode, BCS deserialize) properly propagated, or can partial failures leave the system in an inconsistent state? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Panic Safety] Can any of the operations (BTreeMap insert, hex::encode, serde_json::to_string_pretty, std::fs::write) panic instead of returning errors, causing unexpected crashes? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Panic Safety] Can any of the operations (std::fs::read_to_string, serde_json::from_str, hex::decode, bcs::from_bytes) panic during malformed input handling? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Integrity Protection] Does save_delta include any integrity checks (e.g., checksums, signatures) on the saved delta, or can attackers modify the file undetected? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Tampering Detection] Does load_delta verify the integrity of loaded data, or can modified/corrupted files be loaded without detection, potentially causing state corruption? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Confidentiality] Does save_delta encrypt sensitive state data before writing to disk, or can attackers read validator state, account balances, or private data from delta files? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Authentication] Does load_delta verify the source/authenticity of delta files, or can attackers inject malicious state from untrusted sources? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [Simulation Manipulation] Can an attacker modify delta files to inject fake state changes, making governance proposal simulations show incorrect results and misleading voters? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Simulation Replay] Can saved deltas be replayed in different contexts to bypass security checks or create inconsistent simulation results? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: load_delta()] [State Forgery] Can an attacker craft delta files that forge state changes (e.g., increased token balances, modified validator set) to manipulate simulation outcomes? (Critical)
